title: Supervisory Policy 3 - Notice of Minimum Balance Requirements on Day-of-Deposit to Day-of-Withdrawal Savings Accounts
content:
Supervisory Policy 3 - Notice of Minimum Balance Requirements on Day-of-Deposit to Day-of-Withdrawal Savings Accounts

State Regulations
§ 3.1 - Notice of minimum balance requirements to be given depositors, version 3
§ 3.2 - Sample notice, version 2
§ 3.3 - Application to passbooks already issued, version 2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
